overview: Selena Rose and her boyfriend Marco Banderas like to spice up their sex life by watching porn. After a viewing session leads to a horny banging, they come across a hardcore video that features their friend, Carrie as porn star Riley Steele. When confronted, Carrie denies she would be the popular hardcore adult actress, but that does not stop Selena from spreading the gossip.
title: She Looks Like Me
